definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Xie Zhaohua received a doctor degree in Law from University of Paris XI, France, in 1988.
sentences.chinese: 1988年在法国巴黎第十一大学获得法学博士学位。

sentences.english: JD carried out an elegant bathroom vanities and a large stock one.
sentences.chinese: 法学博士进行了时尚的单浴室面盆大盘点。

sentences.english: The university conferred on him the title of LL.D.
sentences.chinese: 该学院授予他法学博士称号。

sentences.english: Ming Dong, Licensed Chinese lawyer and United States Attorney, Juris Doctor.
sentences.chinese: 董明，法学博士，律师，美国纽约州执业律师。

sentences.english: Jiang Peng Doctor of Law, Lecturer, Economy and Management School, Tsinghua University.
sentences.chinese: 姜朋，法学博士，清华大学经济管理学院讲师。

sentences.english: Lecturer, China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 张丽清，法学博士，中国政法大学人文学院讲师。

sentences.english: That same area was once occupied by the Temple which was a biblically designated holy place.
sentences.chinese: 这些区域的规定分别是由官方犹太教法学博士所定。

sentences.english: Jiang Peng of Law, Lecturer of Tsinghua University, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 姜朋，法学博士，清华大学经济管理学院讲师。

sentences.english: The university conferred on him the title of LLD.
sentences.chinese: 该大学授予他法学博士称号。

sentences.english: I decided to go through the hardship of studying for a JD degree in the US.
sentences.chinese: 我决定在美国咬着牙读一个法学博士学位。

pinyin: gong1 shang1 guan3 li3 shuo4 shi4

definition: China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing, with undergraduate campus at Changping 昌平[Chang1 ping2], and graduate campus in Haidian district 海澱區|海淀区[Hai3 dian4 qu1]
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Zheng4 fa3 Da4 xue2

definition: doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
PhD degree (Doctor of Philosophy)/also abbr. to 博士學位|博士学位

definition: jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school
